segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is about to fall, but he’s too focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless he’s being—he’s going to hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and he’s still reaching for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl should pull him down before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor makes it even worse—what if he slips?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore—someone needs to stop them.
segments.speaker: PAR
